Articles.Content:
So yeah, at the first of every month, rep your favorite mod!

What if I don't have rep to give?

Send them a compliment instead!

Does anyone think this is a good idea?

> 
> Does anyone think this is a good idea?

No, I don't. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Compliments, maybe. Rep, no.
'Mod' as in modification or 'mod' as in moderator?

> 
> 'Mod' as in modification or 'mod' as in moderator?

Actually that's a good question. :/

> 
> 'Mod' as in modification or 'mod' as in moderator?

Moderators! They need rep for the awesome moderating they do!

> 
> Rep pls

Bad moderator, go build an awesome spaceplane or something. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Wait wait wait, just for the fun of it, let's take the initials of everyone's profile titles.

SE

RR

GM

QDF

KT

EM

IMA

I don't know what the point of this was.

What about.. locations?

KSC.

KA.

J2012.

KA.

L.

KSC.

CIS.

KA.

TCA.

POTSCA.

> 
> J2012.

That's clearly a date and not a location.
